title: Targons blade i need help if possible
body:
This is strictly only with my laptop.

When i game at night i hit around 300 ping in intervals. Sometimes ill go to 5000 ping for no reason.  itll stay at 200-300 ping for a few minutes then go back to normal 24 ping.

But i check my internet and everything is working there is no lag or anything and my chart shows there is no spikes on my internet?

Im not saying its league but maybe something on my computer is interacting with league and giving me hard ping. i know f:lux used to give me 140 ping no matter what until i uninstalled it.

Is there anything i can do to find out this issue? Again this is only with my laptop

replies.body:
Ohai~

There are a lot of factors that can determine what latency (ping) you'll see to the League servers. Since this only happens on your laptop, it's possible there is either an issue with the network adapter on your laptop, or it could be a network setting that is local to just the laptop. A good starting point is to ensure your local settings on the laptop match those listed in our [connection guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if you still see huge latency increases after you've taken all the steps in the guide I linked.
